item.title: VMware Learning VCDX Spotlight
item.author: Author
item.description: I’m honored to be featured by VMware Learning on the VCDX spotlight! Check out the blog here.

item.title: Common Questions around VCDX-NV
item.author: Author
item.description: When I was starting my journey to achieve the VCDX-NV certification, I had a lot of questions. Now after going through the certification process, I thought it might be useful if I help answer some of those questions in a blogpost. Here we go! Common FAQs Should I use NSX-V or NSX-T in my design? This is entirely up to you. Of course you have to be technical and extremely knowledgeable with the product (NSX-V or NSX-T), but remember that VCDX is an exam for architects.
